Articles.Content:
Sorry if this is blatantly obvious, but is there any mod that overhauls the career contracts system?

Logged hundreds of hours in KSP and have reset numerous times, I'm getting really bored of the 'grind' feeling alot of the current contracts have.

Cheers for any help.

> 
> Sorry if this is blatantly obvious, but is there any mod that overhauls the career contracts system?
> Logged hundreds of hours in KSP and have reset numerous times, I'm getting really bored of the 'grind' feeling alot of the current contracts have. 
> 
> Cheers for any help.

Look at the Contracts Packs charts of [Contract Configurator](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101604-1-0-3-Contract-Configurator-v1-4-2-2015-06-18) the same as the reply above this one
